title: New Life for Nuclear
description:
Duke Energy CEO Lynn Good talks about what's next for fission and why the company is putting its wind and solar business up for sale. Plus, Trex CEO Bryan Fairbanks shares an inside look at home improvement demand.

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
